arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ عَنْهَا لَا تُفَتَّحُ لَهُمْ أَبْوَٰبُ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَلَا يَدْخُلُونَ ٱلْجَنَّةَ حَتَّىٰ يَلِجَ ٱلْجَمَلُ فِى سَمِّ ٱلْخِيَاطِ ۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	 those	 who	 denied	 Our	 signs	 and	
were	conceited	towards	them	-the	gates	of	
the	 heavens	will	 not	 be	 opened	 for	 them	
nor	 will	 they	 enter	 Paradise	 until	 the	
camel	goes	through	the	needle’s	eye	*;	and	
this	 is	 the	 sort	 of	 reward	 We	 give	 the	
guilty.	(*	Which	will	never	happen.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jinhoñ	ne	Hamāri	āayateiñ	jhutlayiñ	
aur	unke	muqābil	takabbur	kiya	unke	liye	
āasmān	ke	darwāze	na	khole	jāyeñge	aur	
na	woh	jannat	meiñ	dākhil	hoñ	jab	tak	suyi	
ke	nāke	ooñt	na	dākhil	ho	aur	mujrimoñ	ko	
hum	aisa	hi	badla	dete	haiñ

arabicText: لَهُم مِّن جَهَنَّمَ مِهَادٌۭ وَمِن فَوْقِهِمْ غَوَاشٍۢ ۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Their	beds	and	 their	coverings	- both	are	
fire;	and	this	is	the	sort	of	reward	We	give	
the	unjust
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unheiñ	āag	hi	bichhaona	aur	āag		hi	odhna	
aur	Ƶālimoñ	ko	Hum	aisa	hi	badla	dete	haiñ

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَا نُكَلِّفُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَآ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ۖ هُمْ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 those	 who	 accepted	 faith	 and	
performed	good	deeds	according	 to	 their	
capacity	 - We	 do	 not	 burden	 any	 one,	
except	within	its	capacity	- are	the	people	
of Paradise;	they	shall	abide	in	it	forever.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 woh	 jo	 Imān	 lāye	 aur	 tāqat	 bhar	
achchhe	 kām	 kiye	Hum	 kisi	 par	 tāqat	 se	
ziyada	 bojh	 nahi	 rakhte	woh	Jannat	wāle	
haiñ	unheiñ	us	meiñ	hamesha	rehna

arabicText: وَنَزَعْنَا مَا فِى صُدُورِهِم مِّنْ غِلٍّۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهِمُ ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۖ وَقَالُوا۟ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى هَدَىٰنَا لِهَـٰذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لِنَهْتَدِىَ لَوْلَآ أَنْ هَدَىٰنَا ٱللَّهُ ۖ لَقَدْ جَآءَتْ رُسُلُ رَبِّنَا بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ وَنُودُوٓا۟ أَن تِلْكُمُ ٱلْجَنَّةُ أُورِثْتُمُوهَا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	have	removed	resentment	from	their	hearts	- rivers	will	flow	beneath	them;	and	(while	
entering	Paradise)	they	will	say,	“All	praise	is	to	Allah,	Who	guided	us	to	this;	we	would	not	have	
attained	 the	 right	path	if	Allah had	 not	 guided	 us;	indeed	 the	Noble	Messengers	 of	 our	 Lord	
brought	the	truth”;	and	it	is	proclaimed,	“You	have	received	this	Paradise	as	an	inheritance	for	
what	you	used	to	do.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	hum	ne	unke	seenoñ	meiñ	se	keene	kheeñch	liye	unke	neeche	nehreiñ		bahengi	aur	kaheñge	
sab	khoobyāñ	Allah	ko	jis	ne	hameiñ	uski	rāh	dikhayi	aur	hum	rāh	na	pāte	agar	Allah	na	dikhāta	
be-shak	 hamāre	 Rab	 ke	 Rasool	 haq	lāye	 aur	 nida	 huyi	 ke	 yeh	Jannat	 tumheiñ	mirās	mili	 sila	
tumhāre	a’amāl	ka

arabicText: وَنَادَىٰٓ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلنَّارِ أَن قَدْ وَجَدْنَا مَا وَعَدَنَا رَبُّنَا حَقًّۭا فَهَلْ وَجَدتُّم مَّا وَعَدَ رَبُّكُمْ حَقًّۭا ۖ قَالُوا۟ نَعَمْ ۚ فَأَذَّنَ مُؤَذِّنٌۢ بَيْنَهُمْ أَن لَّعْنَةُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَى ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 the	 people	 of	 Paradise	 said	 to	 the	
people	 of	 hell,	 “We	 have	 surely	 received	
what	our	Lord	had	truly	promised	us	- so	
have	you	also	received	what	your	Lord	had	
truly	promised?”	They	said,	“Yes”;	and	an	
announcer	 between	 them	 proclaimed,	
“The	curse	of	Allah is	upon	the	unjust.”	-
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Jannat	 wāloñ	 ne	 dozakh	 wāloñ	 ko	
pukara	 ke	 hameiñ	 to	mil	gaya	jo	 sachcha	
w’ada	hum	se	hamāre	Rab	ne	 kiya	 tha	 to	
kya	 tumne	 bhi	 pāya	 jo	 tumhāre	 Rab	 ne	
sachcha	w’ada	tumheiñ		diya	tha	bole	hān	
aur	beech	meiñ	munādi	ne	pukār	diya	ke	
Allah	ki	l’ānat	Ƶālimoñ	par

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ يَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَبْغُونَهَا عِوَجًۭا وَهُم بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ كَـٰفِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“Those	who	prevent	from	the	path	of	Allah
and	wish	to	distort	it;	and	who	disbelieve	
in	the	Hereafter.”-
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jo	Allah	ki	rāh	se	rokte	haiñ	aur	us	se	kaji	
chāhte	 haiñ	 aur	 āakhirat	 ka	 inkār	 rakhte	
haiñ.

arabicText: وَبَيْنَهُمَا حِجَابٌۭ ۚ وَعَلَى ٱلْأَعْرَافِ رِجَالٌۭ يَعْرِفُونَ كُلًّۢا بِسِيمَىٰهُمْ ۚ وَنَادَوْا۟ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ أَن سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۚ لَمْ يَدْخُلُوهَا وَهُمْ يَطْمَعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Between	Paradise	and	Hell	is	a	veil;	and	on	
the	 Heights	 will	 be	 some	 men	 who	 will	
recognise	them	all	by	their	foreheads;	and	
they	call	to	the	people	of	Paradise,	“Peace	
be	 upon	 you”;	 they	 have	 not	 entered	
Paradise	and	they	yearn	for	it.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Jannat-o-Dozakh	 ke	 beech	 meiñ	 ek	
parda	hai	aur	a'arāf	par	kuch	mard	hoñge	
ke	 donoñ	 fareeq	 ko	 unki	 peshāniyoñ	 se	
pehchāneñ	 ge	 aur	 woh	 Jannatiyoñ	 ko	
pukāreñge	 ke	 salām	 tum	 par	 yeh	 jannat	
meiñ	na gaye	aur	iski	tama'	rakhte	haiñ

arabicText: ۞ وَإِذَا صُرِفَتْ أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ تِلْقَآءَ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلنَّارِ قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا لَا تَجْعَلْنَا مَعَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 when	 their	 eyes	 turn	 towards	 the	
people	of	hell,	they	will	say,	“Our	Lord!	Do	
not	put	us	along	with	the	unjust.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	unki	āankheiñ	Dozakhyoñ	ki	taraf	
phireñgi	 kaheñge	 aey	 hamāre	 Rab"
Hameiñ	Ƶālimoñ	ke	sāth	na	kar

arabicText: وَنَادَىٰٓ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْأَعْرَافِ رِجَالًۭا يَعْرِفُونَهُم بِسِيمَىٰهُمْ قَالُوا۟ مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنكُمْ جَمْعُكُمْ وَمَا كُنتُمْ تَسْتَكْبِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 the	 men	 on	 the	 Heights	 will	 call	 to	
some	men	whom	 they	 recognise	 by	 their	
foreheads,	and	say,	“What	benefit	did	your	
derive	from	your	populace	and	from	what	
you	prided	in?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	a'arāf	wāle	kuch	mardoñ	ko	pukāreñ	
ge	jinheiñ	unki	peshāni	se	pehchānte	haiñ	
kaheñge	tumheiñ		kya	kām	āaya	tumhāra	
jath-tha	aur	woh	jo	tum	ghuroor	karte	they

arabicText: أَهَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ٱلَّذِينَ أَقْسَمْتُمْ لَا يَنَالُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِرَحْمَةٍ ۚ ٱدْخُلُوا۟ ٱلْجَنَّةَ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْكُمْ وَلَآ أَنتُمْ تَحْزَنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“Are	these	the	people	(Muslims)	regarding	
whom	 you	 swore	 that	 Allah would	 not	
have	mercy	on	them	at	all?	Whereas	to	the	
Muslims	it	has	been	said	‘Enter	Paradise;	
you	shall	have	no	fear	nor	any	grief.’	”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	yeh	haiñ	woh	log	jin	par	tum	qasmeiñ	
khāte	 they	 ke	 Allah	 un	 par	 apni	 raḥmat	
kuch	na	karega	unse	to	kaha	gaya	ke	jannat	meiñ	jāo	na	tum	ko	andesha	na	kuchh	gham

arabicText: وَنَادَىٰٓ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ أَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ أَنْ أَفِيضُوا۟ عَلَيْنَا مِنَ ٱلْمَآءِ أَوْ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ۚ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ حَرَّمَهُمَا عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	people	of	hell	will	cry	out	to	the	people	of	Paradise,	“Provide	us	some	benefit	from	your	
water	or	from	the	food	Allah has	provided	you”;	they	will	say,	“Indeed	Allah has	forbidden	both	
to	the	disbelievers.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	dozakhi	bihishtiyoñ	ko	pukāreñge	ke	hameiñ	apne	pāni	ka	kuchh	faiz	do	ya	us	khāne	ka	jo	
Allah	ne	tumheiñ		diya	kaheñge		be-shak	Allah	ne	in	donoñ	ko	kāfiroñ	par	harām	kiya	hai

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ دِينَهُمْ لَهْوًۭا وَلَعِبًۭا وَغَرَّتْهُمُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۚ فَٱلْيَوْمَ نَنسَىٰهُمْ كَمَا نَسُوا۟ لِقَآءَ يَوْمِهِمْ هَـٰذَا وَمَا كَانُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا يَجْحَدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
People	who	made	their	religion	a	sport	and	pastime,	and	whom	the	worldly	life	deceived;	so	this	
day	We	will	disregard	them,	the	way	they	had	neglected	their	confronting	of	this	day,	and	the	
way	they	used	to	deny	Our	signs.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jinhoñ	ne	apne	Deen	ko	khel	tamāsha	bana	liya	aur	duniya	ki	zeest	ne	unheiñ	fareb	diya	to	āaj	
hum	unheiñ	chhod	deñge jaisa	unhoñ	ne	us	din	ke	milne	ka	khayāl	chhoda	tha	aur	jaisa	hamāri	
āayatoñ	se	inkār	karte	they.

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ جِئْنَـٰهُم بِكِتَـٰبٍۢ فَصَّلْنَـٰهُ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍ هُدًۭى وَرَحْمَةًۭ لِّقَوْمٍۢ يُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 indeed We	 brought	 to	 them	 a	 Book,	
which	We	have	explained	in	detail	with	a	
great	knowledge	- a	guidance	and	a	mercy	
for	people	who	believe.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 be-shak	Hum	 unke	 pās	ek	Kitāb	lāye	
jise	Hum	ne	ek	bade	Ilm	se	mufassal	kiya	
Hidayat-o-Raḥmat	Imān	wāloñ		ke	liye

arabicText: هَلْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا تَأْوِيلَهُۥ ۚ يَوْمَ يَأْتِى تَأْوِيلُهُۥ يَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ نَسُوهُ مِن قَبْلُ قَدْ جَآءَتْ رُسُلُ رَبِّنَا بِٱلْحَقِّ فَهَل لَّنَا مِن شُفَعَآءَ فَيَشْفَعُوا۟ لَنَآ أَوْ نُرَدُّ فَنَعْمَلَ غَيْرَ ٱلَّذِى كُنَّا نَعْمَلُ ۚ قَدْ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَضَلَّ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَفْتَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
What	do	 they	await,	except	 for	 the	result	
foretold	by	 that	Book	 to	appear?	The	day	
when	the	result	foretold	by	it	occurs, those	
who	had	previously	 forgotten	it	 from	 the	
beginning	 (the	 disbelievers)	 will	 exclaim,	
“Indeed	the	Noble	Messengers	of	our	Lord	
had	 brought	 the	 truth!	 Do	 we	 have	 any	
intercessors	who	may	intercede	for	us?	Or	
can	we	be	returned	(to	earth),	so	we	may	
do	contrary	to	what	we	have	done	before?”	
Indeed	they	have	put	themselves	into	ruin,	
and	have	lost	the	things	they	fabricated.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kāhe	ki	rāh	dekhte	haiñ	magar	us	ki	ke	is	
kitāb	ka	kaha	huwa	anjām	sāmne	āaye	jis	
din	 iska	 bataya	 anjām	 wāqe'	 hoga	 bol	
utheñge	woh	jo	ise	pehle	se	bhulaye	baithe	
they	ke	be-shak	hamāre	Rab	ke	Rasool	haq	
lāye	 they	 to	 haiñ	 koi	 hamāre	 sifārishi	 jo	
hamāri	 shafā'at	 kareiñ	 ya	 hum	 wāpas	
bheje	jāyeiñ	ke	pehle	kāmoñ	ke	khilāf	kām	
kareiñ	 be-shak	 unhoñ	 ne	 apni	 jāneiñ	
nuqsān	meiñ	dāliñ	aur	unse	khoye	gaye	jo	
bohtān	uthāte	they

arabicText: إِنَّ رَبَّكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍۢ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْعَرْشِ يُغْشِى ٱلَّيْلَ ٱلنَّهَارَ يَطْلُبُهُۥ حَثِيثًۭا وَٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ وَٱلنُّجُومَ مُسَخَّرَٰتٍۭ بِأَمْرِهِۦٓ ۗ أَلَا لَهُ ٱلْخَلْقُ وَٱلْأَمْرُ ۗ تَبَارَكَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	your	Lord	is	Allah Who	created	the	
heavens	 and	 the	 earth	 in	 six	 days,	 then	
(befitting	His	Majesty)	established	Himself	
upon	the	 Throne	(of	 control));	He	 covers	
the	 night	 with	 the	 day,	 which	 hastily	
follows	it,	and	made	the	sun	and	the	moon	
and	the	stars	subservient	to	His	command;	
pay	heed!	Only	He	has	the	power	to	create	
and	 command;	 Most	 Auspicious	
(Propitious)	 is	 Allah,	 the	 Lord	 Of	 The	
Creation.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	 tumhāra	 Rab	 Allah	 hai	 jis	 ne	
āasmān	 aur	 zameen	 chhe (6) din	 meiñ	
banaye	phir	‘arsh	par	istawa	farmaya	jaisa	
uski	shān	ke	lāiq	hai	rāt	din	ko	ek	doosre	
se	 dhāñkta	 hai	 ke	 jald	 uske	 peeche	 laga	
āata	hai	aur	sooraj	aur	chāñd	aur	tāroñ	ko	
banaya	sab	uske	ḥukm		ke	dabe	huwe	sun	
lo	 usi	 ke	 hāth	 hai	 paida	 karna	 aur	 ḥukm		
dena	badi	barkat	wāla	hai	Allah	Rab	sāre	
jahān	ka

arabicText: ٱدْعُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ تَضَرُّعًۭا وَخُفْيَةً ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُعْتَدِينَ
englishTranslationText: Pray	to	your	Lord	crying	humbly,	and	softly;	indeed	He	does	not	love	the	transgressors.
romanUrduTranslationText: Apne	Rab	se	du'a	karo	gidgidāte	aur	āhista	be-shak	had	se	badhne	wāle	usey	pasand	nahi

arabicText: وَلَا تُفْسِدُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ بَعْدَ إِصْلَـٰحِهَا وَٱدْعُوهُ خَوْفًۭا وَطَمَعًا ۚ إِنَّ رَحْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ قَرِيبٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	do	not	spread	 turmoil	in	 the	earth	after	its	reform,	and	pray	 to	Him	with	 fear	and	hope;	
indeed	Allah’s	mercy	is	close	to	the	virtuous.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	zameen	meiñ	fasād	na	phailāo	iske	sawarne	ke	b’ad	aur	us	se	du’a	karo	darte	aur	tama'	karte	
be-shak	Allah	ki	raḥmat	nekoñ	se	qareeb	hai

arabicText: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُرْسِلُ ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ بُشْرًۢا بَيْنَ يَدَىْ رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَقَلَّتْ سَحَابًۭا ثِقَالًۭا سُقْنَـٰهُ لِبَلَدٍۢ مَّيِّتٍۢ فَأَنزَلْنَا بِهِ ٱلْمَآءَ فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِۦ مِن كُلِّ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نُخْرِجُ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	it	is	He	Who	sends	the	winds	giving	glad	tidings,	ahead	of	His	mercy;	until	when	they	come	
bearing	heavy	clouds,	We	drove	it	 towards	a	city	devoid	of	vegetation,	and	 then	rained	water	
upon	it,	then	produced	fruits	of	various	kinds	from	it;	this	is	how	We	will	bring	forth	the	dead,	so	
that	you	may	heed	advice.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	wohi	hai	 ke	hawaeiñ	bhejta	hai	uski	 raḥmat	 ke	āage	muzda	sunāti yahāñ	 tak	 ke	jab	uthā	
lāayeiñ	bhāri	bādal	hum	ne	usey	kisi	murda	shaher	ki	taraf	chalāya	phir	us	se	pāni	utāra	phir	us	
se	tarah	tarah	ke	phal	nikāle	isi	tarah	hum	murdoñ	ko	nikāleñ	ge	kahiñ	tum	nasihat	māno

arabicText: وَٱلْبَلَدُ ٱلطَّيِّبُ يَخْرُجُ نَبَاتُهُۥ بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِۦ ۖ وَٱلَّذِى خَبُثَ لَا يَخْرُجُ إِلَّا نَكِدًۭا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نُصَرِّفُ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ لِقَوْمٍۢ يَشْكُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 from	 the	 good	 land	 comes	 forth	 its	
vegetation	by	 the	command	of	Allah;	and	
from	 the	 infertile	 land,	 nothing	 comes	
forth	except	a	little	with	difficulty;	 this	is	
how	 We	 explain	 Our	 signs	 in	 different	
ways,	for	people	who	are	thankful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jo	 achchhi	 zameen	 hai	 uska	 sabzah	
Allah	ke	hukm	se	nikalta	hai	aur	jo	kharāb	
hai	us	meiñ	nahi	nikalta	magar	 thoda	bamushkil	 Hum	 yuñ	 hi	 tarah	 tarah	 se	
āayateiñ	 bayān	 karte	 haiñ	 unke	 liye	 jo	
ehsān	māneiñ.

arabicText: لَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ فَقَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	 We	 sent	 Nooh	 to	 his	 people	 - he	
therefore	 said,	 “O	 my	 people!	 Worship	
Allah - you	 do	 not	 have	 any	 God	 except	
Him;	indeed	I	fear	for	you	the	punishment	
of	the	Great	Day	(of	Resurrection).”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	 Hum	 ne	 Nooh ko	 uski	 qaum	 ki	
taraf	 bheja	 to	 usne	 kahā	 aey	meri	 qaum"
Allah	 ko	 poojo	 uske	 siwa	 tumhāra	 koi	
ma’bood	nahi	beshak	mujhe	tum	par	bade	
din	ke	‘aƶāb		ka	dar	hai.

arabicText: قَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِن قَوْمِهِۦٓ إِنَّا لَنَرَىٰكَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
The	leaders	of	his	people	said,	“Indeed	we	
see	you	in	open	error.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Uski	 qaum	 ke	 sardār	 bole	 beshak	 hum	
tumheiñ	khuli	gumrāhi	meiñ	dekhte	haiñ

arabicText: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ لَيْسَ بِى ضَلَـٰلَةٌۭ وَلَـٰكِنِّى رَسُولٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
He	said,	“O	my	people!	There	is	no	straying	
in	me	- I	am	in	fact	a	Noble	Messenger	from	
the	Lord	Of	The	Creation.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kahā	aey	meri	qaum" mujh	meiñ	gumrāhi	
kuchh	 nahi	 maiñ	 to	 Rabbul	 Āalameen	 ka	
Rasool	hooñ

arabicText: أُبَلِّغُكُمْ رِسَـٰلَـٰتِ رَبِّى وَأَنصَحُ لَكُمْ وَأَعْلَمُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“Conveying	 to	 you	 the	 messages	 of	 my	
Lord	and	wishing	good	for	you,	and	I	know	
from	Allah what	you	do	not	know.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tumheiñ	 apne	 Rab	 ki	 Risālateiñ	
pahuñchāta	aur	tumhāra	bhala	chāhta	aur	
maiñ	Allah	ki	taraf	se	woh	Ilm	rakhta	hooñ	
jo	tum	nahi	rakhte.

arabicText: أَوَعَجِبْتُمْ أَن جَآءَكُمْ ذِكْرٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٍۢ مِّنكُمْ لِيُنذِرَكُمْ وَلِتَتَّقُوا۟ وَلَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“And	 are	 you	 surprised	 that	 an	 advice	
came	to	you	from	your	Lord	through	a	man	
amongst	you,	so	that	he	may	warn	you	and	
that	 you	 may	 fear,	 and	 so	 that	 there	 be	
mercy	upon	you?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kya	tumheiñ	iska	achambha	(T’ajjub)	
huwa	ke	tumhāre	pās	tumhāre	Rab	ki	taraf	
se	ek	nasihat	āayi	tum	meiñ	ke	ek	mard	ki	
m’arifat	 ke	woh	 tumheiñ	 daraye	aur	 tum	
daro	aur	kaheiñ	tum	par	rahem	ho

arabicText: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُ وَٱلَّذِينَ مَعَهُۥ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ وَأَغْرَقْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا عَمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
In	 response	 they	 denied	 him,	 so	 We	
rescued	 him	 and	 those	 with	 him	 in	 the	
ship,	and	We	drowned	those	who	denied	Our	signs;	indeed	they	were	a	blind	group.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	unhoñ	ne	usey	jhutlāya	to	hum	ne	usey	
aur jo	uske	sāth	kashti	meiñ	they	najāt	di	aur	apni	āayateiñ	jhutlāne	wāloñ	ko	dubo	diya	beshak	
woh	andha	giroh	tha

arabicText: ۞ وَإِلَىٰ عَادٍ أَخَاهُمْ هُودًۭا ۗ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥٓ ۚ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	sent	Hud	to	the	people	of	Aad	from	their	own	community;	he	said,	“O	my	people!	Worship	
Allah - you	do	not	have	any	God	except	Him;	so	do	you	not	fear?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Āad	ki	taraf	unki	birādri	se	Hood	ko	bheja	kaha	aey	meri	qaum" Allah	ki	bandagi	karo	uske	
siwa	tumhāra	koi	m’abood	nahi	to	kya	tumheiñ	dar nahi

arabicText: قَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن قَوْمِهِۦٓ إِنَّا لَنَرَىٰكَ فِى سَفَاهَةٍۢ وَإِنَّا لَنَظُنُّكَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ
englishTranslationText:
The	disbelieving	leaders	of	his	people	said,	“Indeed	we	consider	you	foolish	and	think	you	are	a	
liar.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Uski	qaum	ke	sardār	bole	beshak	hum	tumheiñ	bewaqoof	samajhte	haiñ	aur	beshak	hum	tumheiñ	
jhootoñ	meiñ	gumān	karte	haiñ.

arabicText: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ لَيْسَ بِى سَفَاهَةٌۭ وَلَـٰكِنِّى رَسُولٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
He	 said,	 “O	 my	 people!	 I	 do	 not	 have	 any	 concern	 with	 foolishness	 and	 I	 am	 in	 fact	 a	 Noble	
Messenger	from	the	Lord	Of	The	Creation.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kahā	aey	meri	qaum" Mujhe	bewaqoofi	se	kya	ilāqa	(T’alluq)	maiñ	to	Parwardigār-e-Āalam	ka	
Rasool	hooñ

arabicText: أُبَلِّغُكُمْ رِسَـٰلَـٰتِ رَبِّى وَأَنَا۠ لَكُمْ نَاصِحٌ أَمِينٌ
englishTranslationText:
He	 said,	 “O	 my	 people!	 I	 do	 not	 have	 any	 concern	 with	 foolishness	 and	 I	 am	 in	 fact	 a	 Noble	
Messenger	from	the	Lord	Of	The	Creation.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
“I	convey	to	you	the	messages	of	my	Lord	
and	am	your	trustworthy	well-wisher.”

arabicText: أَوَعَجِبْتُمْ أَن جَآءَكُمْ ذِكْرٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٍۢ مِّنكُمْ لِيُنذِرَكُمْ ۚ وَٱذْكُرُوٓا۟ إِذْ جَعَلَكُمْ خُلَفَآءَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ قَوْمِ نُوحٍۢ وَزَادَكُمْ فِى ٱلْخَلْقِ بَصْۜطَةًۭ ۖ فَٱذْكُرُوٓا۟ ءَالَآءَ ٱللَّهِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“And	 are	 you	 surprised	 that	 an	 advice	
came	to	you	from	your	Lord	through	a	man	
amongst	 you,	 so	 that	 he	 may	 warn	 you?	
Remember	 when	 He	 made	 you	 the	
successors	of	Nooh’s	people,	and	enlarged	
your	 bodies;	 therefore	 remember	 Allah’s	
favours,	so	that	you	may	attain	good.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kya	tumheiñ	iska	achambha	(T’ajjub)	
huwa	ke	tumhāre	pās	tumhāre	Rab	ki	taraf	
se	ek	nasihat	āayi	tum	meiñ	ke	ek	mard	ki	
m’arifat	 ke	 woh	tumheiñ	 daraye	 aur	 yād	
karo	jab	usne	tumheiñ	Qaum-e-Nooh ka	janasheen	 kiya	 aur	 tumhāre	 badan	 ka	
phailāo	badhaya	to	Allah	ki	n’emateiñ	yād	
karo	ke	kahin	tumhāra	bhala	ho

arabicText: قَالُوٓا۟ أَجِئْتَنَا لِنَعْبُدَ ٱللَّهَ وَحْدَهُۥ وَنَذَرَ مَا كَانَ يَعْبُدُ ءَابَآؤُنَا ۖ فَأْتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
They	said,	“Have	you	come	to	us	in	order	
that	we	worship	only	Allah,	and	abandon	
those	 whom	 our	 ancestors	 worshipped?!	
So	bring	upon	us	what	you	promise	us,	if	
you	are	truthful.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bole	kya	tum	hamāre	pās	is	liye	āaye	ho	ke	
hum	ek	Allah	ko	poojeiñ	aur	jo	hamāre	bāp	
dāda	poojte	they	unheiñ	chhod	deiñ	to	lāo	
jis	 ka	 hameiñ	 w’āda	 de	 rahe	 ho	 agar	
sachche	ho.

arabicText: قَالَ قَدْ وَقَعَ عَلَيْكُم مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ رِجْسٌۭ وَغَضَبٌ ۖ أَتُجَـٰدِلُونَنِى فِىٓ أَسْمَآءٍۢ سَمَّيْتُمُوهَآ أَنتُمْ وَءَابَآؤُكُم مَّا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَا مِن سُلْطَـٰنٍۢ ۚ فَٱنتَظِرُوٓا۟ إِنِّى مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُنتَظِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
He	 said,	 “Indeed	 the	 punishment	and	 the	
wrath	of	your	Lord	have fallen	upon	you;	
what!	 You	 needlessly	 dispute	 with	 me	
regarding	 the	 names	 you	 and	 your	
ancestors	 have	 fabricated?	 Allah has	 not	
sent	 down	 any	 proof	 concerning	 them;	
therefore	wait	- I	too	await	with	you.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kahā	zaroor	tum	par	tumhāre	Rab	ka	‘aƶāb		
aur	ghazab	pad	gaya	kya	mujh	se	khāli	un	
nāmoñ	meiñ	jhagad	rahe	ho	jo	tum	ne	aur	
tumhāre	 bāp	 dāda	 ne	 rakh	 liye	 Allah	 ne	
unki	 koi	 sanad	 na	 utāri	 to	 rāsta	 dekho	
maiñ	bhi	tumhāre	sāth	dekhta	hooñ

arabicText: فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُ وَٱلَّذِينَ مَعَهُۥ بِرَحْمَةٍۢ مِّنَّا وَقَطَعْنَا دَابِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا ۖ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
We	therefore	rescued	him	and	those	with	
him	by	a	great	mercy	from	Us,	and	We	cut	
off	 the	 lineage	 of	 those	 who	 denied	 Our	
signs	- and	they	were	not	believers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	hum	ne	usey	aur	uske	sāth	wāloñ	ko	apni	ek	badi	rahmat	 farma	kar	najāt	di	aur	jo	hamāri	
āayateiñ	jhutlāte	they	unki	jad	kāt	di	aur	woh	Imān	wāle	they.

arabicText: وَإِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمْ صَـٰلِحًۭا ۗ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥ ۖ قَدْ جَآءَتْكُم بَيِّنَةٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ ۖ هَـٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةُ ٱللَّهِ لَكُمْ ءَايَةًۭ ۖ فَذَرُوهَا تَأْكُلْ فِىٓ أَرْضِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٍۢ فَيَأْخُذَكُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	sent	Saleh	to	the	tribe	of	Thamud,	from	their	own	community;	he	said,	“O	my	people!	
Worship	Allah - you	do	not	have	any	God	except	Him;	indeed	a	clear	proof	has	come	to	you	from	
your	Lord;	this	is	Allah’s	she-camel	- a	sign	for	you	- so	leave	her	free	to	feed	in	Allah’s	earth,	and	
do	not	touch	her	with	evil	intentions	for	a	painful	punishment	will	seize	you.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Samood	ki	taraf	unki	birādari	se	Sualeh ko	bheja	kahā	aey	meri	qaum" Allah	ko	poojo	uske	
siwa	tumhāra	koi	m’abood	nahi	beshak	tumhāre	pās	tumhāre	Rab	ki	taraf	se	raushan	daleel	āayi	
yeh	Allah	ka	nāqa	hai	tumhāre	liye	nishāni	to	isey	chhod	do	ke	Allah	ki	zameen	meiñ	khāye	aur	
isey	burāi	se	hāth	na	lagao	ke	tumheiñ	dard-nāk	‘aƶāb		āalega

arabicText: وَٱذْكُرُوٓا۟ إِذْ جَعَلَكُمْ خُلَفَآءَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ عَادٍۢ وَبَوَّأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ تَتَّخِذُونَ مِن سُهُولِهَا قُصُورًۭا وَتَنْحِتُونَ ٱلْجِبَالَ بُيُوتًۭا ۖ فَٱذْكُرُوٓا۟ ءَالَآءَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا تَعْثَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مُفْسِدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“And	 remember	 when	 He	 made	 you	
successors	of	A’ad	and	gave	you	a	region	in	
the	earth,	so	you	now	build	palaces	in	the	
soft	 plains	 and	 carve	 houses	 in	 rocks;	
therefore	 remember	 Allah’s	 favours	 and	
do	not	roam	the	earth	spreading	turmoil.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yād	karo	jab	tumko	Āa’d	ka	ja-nasheen	
kiya	 aur	 mulk	 meiñ	 jagah	 di	 ke	 narm	
zameen	 meiñ	 mahel	 banāte	 ho	 aur	
pahādoñ	meiñ	makān	tarāshte	ho	to	Allah	
ki	 n’emateiñ	 yād	 karo	 aur	 zameen	 meiñ	
fasād	machāte	na	phiro.

arabicText: قَالَ ٱلْمَلَأُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ مِن قَوْمِهِۦ لِلَّذِينَ ٱسْتُضْعِفُوا۟ لِمَنْ ءَامَنَ مِنْهُمْ أَتَعْلَمُونَ أَنَّ صَـٰلِحًۭا مُّرْسَلٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ ۚ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا بِمَآ أُرْسِلَ بِهِۦ مُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
The	 proud	 leaders of	 his	 people	
(mockingly)	said	to	the	weak	Muslims,	“Do	
you	 know	 that	Saleh	is	(really)	the	Noble	
Messenger	 of	 his	 Lord?”	 They	 said,	 “We	
believe	 in	 whatever	 he	 has	 been	 sent	
with.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Uski	 qaum	 ke	 takabbur	 wāle	 kamzor	
Musalmanoñ	se	bole	kya	 tum	jānte	ho	ke	
Sāleh	apne	Rab	ke	Rasool	haiñ	bole	woh	jo	
kuchh	lekar	bheje	gaye	hum	us	par	 Imān	
rakhte	haiñ

arabicText: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسْتَكْبَرُوٓا۟ إِنَّا بِٱلَّذِىٓ ءَامَنتُم بِهِۦ كَـٰفِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
The	proud	ones	said,	“We	deny	what	you	
have	believed	in.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Mutakabbir	 bole	 jis	 par	 tum	 Imān	 lāye	
hameiñ	us	se	inkār	hai

arabicText: فَعَقَرُوا۟ ٱلنَّاقَةَ وَعَتَوْا۟ عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ وَقَالُوا۟ يَـٰصَـٰلِحُ ٱئْتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	 they	 hamstrung	 the	 she-camel	 and	
rebelled	 against	 the	 command	 of	 their	
Lord	 and	 said,	 “O	 Saleh!	 Bring	 upon	 us	
what	 you	 promise	 us,	 if	 you	 are	 a	 Noble	
Messenger.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Pas	nāqa	ki	koocheiñ	(Qadam)	kāt	deiñ	aur	
apne	Rab	ke	hukm	se	sarkashi	ki	aur	bole	
aey	Sāleh" Hum	par	le	āao	jis	ka	tum	w’āda	
de	rahe	ho	agar	tum	Rasool	ho

arabicText: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلرَّجْفَةُ فَأَصْبَحُوا۟ فِى دَارِهِمْ جَـٰثِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	the	earthquake	seized	them,	so	
at	morning	 they	remained	lying	 flattened	
in	their	homes.
romanUrduTranslationText: To	unheiñ	zalzale	ne	āa	liya	to	subah	ko	apne	gharoñ	meiñ	auñdhe	rah	gaye.

arabicText: فَتَوَلَّىٰ عَنْهُمْ وَقَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ لَقَدْ أَبْلَغْتُكُمْ رِسَالَةَ رَبِّى وَنَصَحْتُ لَكُمْ وَلَـٰكِن لَّا تُحِبُّونَ ٱلنَّـٰصِحِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Saleh therefore	 turned	 away	 from	 them	
and	 said,	 “O	 my	 people!	 Indeed	 I	 did	
deliver	 my	 Lord’s	 message	 to	 you	 and	
wished	you	good,	but	you	do	not	want	well-wishers.”	(The	people	in	the	graves	can	hear	the	speech	
of	those	who	are	on	earth.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	Sāleh ne	unse	mooñh	phera	aur	kaha	aey	meri	qaum" Beshak	maiñ	ne	tumheiñ	apne	Rab	ki	
Risalat	 pahuñcha	 di	 aur	 tumhāra	 bhala	 chāha	magar	 tum	 khair	 khwahoñ	 ke	 gharazi	 (Pasand	
karne	wāle)	hi	nahi

arabicText: وَلُوطًا إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِۦٓ أَتَأْتُونَ ٱلْفَـٰحِشَةَ مَا سَبَقَكُم بِهَا مِنْ أَحَدٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	sent	Lut	- when he	said	to	his	people,	“What!	You	commit	the	shameful	acts	which	no	one	
in	the	creation	has	ever	done	before	you?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Lūt ko	bheja	jab	usne	apni	qaum	se	kahā	kya	woh	be-hayayi	karte	ho	jo	tum	se	pehle	jahān	
meiñ	kisi	ne	na	ki.

arabicText: إِنَّكُمْ لَتَأْتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ شَهْوَةًۭ مِّن دُونِ ٱلنِّسَآءِ ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌۭ مُّسْرِفُونَ
englishTranslationText: “You	lustfully	go	towards	men,	instead	of	women!	In	fact,	you	have	transgressed	the	limits.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Tum	to	mardoñ	ke	pās	shahwat	se	jāte	ho	aurteiñ	chhod	kar	balke	tum	log	had	se	guzar	gaye.

arabicText: وَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوْمِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓا۟ أَخْرِجُوهُم مِّن قَرْيَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ أُنَاسٌۭ يَتَطَهَّرُونَ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 uski	 qaum	 ka	 kuchh	 jawab	 na	 tha	
magar	 yehi	 kahna	 ke	 in	 ko	 apni	 basti	 se	
nikāl	do	yeh	log	to	pākeezgi	chāhte	haiñ.

arabicText: فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمْرَأَتَهُۥ كَانَتْ مِنَ ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	rescued	him	and	his	family,	except	
his	wife	- she	became	of	those	who	stayed	
behind.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	 hum	 ne	 usey	 aur	 uske	 ghar	 wālon	 ko	
najāt	 di	 magar	 uski	 aurat	 woh	 rah	 jāne	
wāloñ	meiñ	huyi

arabicText: وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّطَرًۭا ۖ فَٱنظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	rained	a	shower	(of	stones)	upon	
them;	therefore	see	what	sort	of	fate	befell	
the	culprits!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur hum	 ne	 un	 par	 ek	 meñh	 barsāya	 to	
dekho	kaisa	anjām	huwa	mujrimon	ka.

arabicText: وَإِلَىٰ مَدْيَنَ أَخَاهُمْ شُعَيْبًۭا ۗ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرُهُۥ ۖ قَدْ جَآءَتْكُم بَيِّنَةٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ ۖ فَأَوْفُوا۟ ٱلْكَيْلَ وَٱلْمِيزَانَ وَلَا تَبْخَسُوا۟ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشْيَآءَهُمْ وَلَا تُفْسِدُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ بَعْدَ إِصْلَـٰحِهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكُمْ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	sent	Shuaib	to	Madyan	from	their	
community;	 he	 said,	 “O	 my	 people!	
Worship	Allah - you	do	not	have	any	God	
except	Him;	indeed	a	clear	proof	has	come	
to	 you	 from	 your	 Lord,	 so	 measure	 and	
weigh	 in	 full	 and	 do	 not	 give	 the	 people	
their	goods	diminished,	and	do	not	spread	
turmoil	in	 the	 earth	 after	it	is	 organised;	
this	is	for	your	good,	if	you	believe.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Madyan	 ki	 taraf	 unki	 birādari	 se	
Sho’aib ko	 bheja	 kahā	 aey	 meri	 qaum"
Allah	ki	Ibādat	karo	uske	siwa	tumhāra	koi	
m’abood	 nahi	 beshak	 tumhāre	 pās	
tumhāre	 Rab	 ki	 taraf	 se	 Raushan	 Daleel	
āayi	to	nāp	aur	tol	poori	karo	aur	logoñ	ki	
cheezeiñ	ghatā	kar	na	do	aur	zameen	meiñ	
intezām	ke	bād	fasād	na	phailāo	yeh	tumhāra	bhalā	hai	agar	Imān	lāo.

arabicText: وَلَا تَقْعُدُوا۟ بِكُلِّ صِرَٰطٍۢ تُوعِدُونَ وَتَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ مَنْ ءَامَنَ بِهِۦ وَتَبْغُونَهَا عِوَجًۭا ۚ وَٱذْكُرُوٓا۟ إِذْ كُنتُمْ قَلِيلًۭا فَكَثَّرَكُمْ ۖ وَٱنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“And	 do	 not	 be	 seated	 on	 every	 road	 in	
order	 to	 scare	 the	 travellers,	 and	 to	
prevent	from	Allah’s	path	the	people	who	
believe	in	Him,	 wishing	 to	 distort	it;	 and	
remember	 when	 you	 were	 few	 and	 He	
increased	your	numbers;	and	see	what	sort	of	fate	befell	the	mischievous!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	har	rāste	par	yuñ	na	baitho	ke	rāh	geeroñ	ko	darāo	aur	Allah	ki	rāh	se	unheiñ	roko	jo	us	par
Imān	lāye	aur	is	meiñ	kaji	chāho	(Tedha	Rāsta	dhoondo) aur	yād	karo	jab	tum	thode	they	usne	
tumheiñ	badhā	diya	aur	dekho	fasādyoñ	ka	kaisa	anjām	huwa

arabicText: وَإِن كَانَ طَآئِفَةٌۭ مِّنكُمْ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱلَّذِىٓ أُرْسِلْتُ بِهِۦ وَطَآئِفَةٌۭ لَّمْ يُؤْمِنُوا۟ فَٱصْبِرُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يَحْكُمَ ٱللَّهُ بَيْنَنَا ۚ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلْحَـٰكِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“And	if	a	group	among	you	believes	in	what	I	have	been	sent	with,	and	another	group does	not	
believe,	then	wait	until	Allah judges	between	us;	and	Allah’s	judgement	is	the	best	of	all.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	tum	meiñ	ek	giroh	us	par	Imān	lāya	jo	maiñ	lekar	bheja	gaya	aur	ek	giroh	ne	na	māna	to	
thahre	raho	yahāñ	tak	ke	Allah	hum	meiñ	faisla	kare	aur	Allah	ka	faisla	sab	se	behtar.
